assessment.question: What are literals in Java?
options: Functions or methods in a class

assessment.question: How to get user input in Java?
What are operators and expressions in Java?
options: Operators perform operations, and expressions combine variables and values using operators
Operators are variables, and expressions are data types
Operators are functions, and expressions are method calls
Operators are classes, and expressions are objects
assessment.correctAnswer: Operators perform operations, and expressions combine variables and values using operators
